1.title: Print Hello
1.hint: Use the print() function to display text.

2.title: Add Two Numbers
2.hint: Take two variables and assign the values to it and print it.

3.title: Print Your Name
3.description: Store your name in a variable and print it.
3.hint: Assign your name to a variable and use print().

4.title: List Basics
4.description: Print the first item of list [1,2,3,4].

5.title: For Loop
5.description: Print numbers 1 to 5 each on new line.
5.hint: Use a for loop with range(1,6).

6.title: Function
6.description: Create a function greet() that prints Hello.
6.hint: Define a function using def and call it.

9.title: File Handling
9.description: Write 'hi' into a file and print hi.
9.hint: Use open(), write(), close(), then print.

10.title: OOP
10.description: Create class A with method fun() that prints OK.
10.hint: Define a class and call its method.
